activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Khetha umushwana wokudlula ozongena ngawo.
Umusho olula onamagama ambalwa ozowakhumbula kalula.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Khetha umushwana wokudlula omuhle ukuze uvikele i-akhawunti yakho. Bona iziphakamiso zeminye imibono.
activate.IfYouFeel: Uma uzwa sengathi kukhona okungahambanga kahle, ungakwazi

notifications.title: Imvume
notifications.prompt: Uyafuna ukunika amandla izaziso? Uzothola izibuyekezo zesikhathi sangempela mayelana nezinto ozikhathalelayo.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Siyakwamukela! Sicela uqinisekise ikheli lakho le-imeyili.
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: Uqedile ukwenza umsebenzisi asebenze. Zama ukungena ngemvume manje.

login.title: Siyakwamukela
login.resendConfirm: Ingabe ufuna ukuthumela umlayezo ukuze usethe kabusha umushwana wakho wokungena?
login.resendSuccess: Hlola umlayezo wokusetha kabusha umushwana wakho wokungena
login.noPassphrase: Ngaphambi kokuthi ungene ngemvume, kufanele usethe umushwana wokudlula ngokuchofoza isixhumanisi kumlayezo wakho wokwenza kusebenze.
login.notVerified: Kufanele uzithumele umlayezo wokwenza kusebenze ukuze ungene ngemvume.
login.emailExists: Ingabe uke wazama ukubhalisa ngale imeyili ngaphambilini? Uma kunjalo, hlola ibhokisi lokungenayo ukuze uvule i-akhawunti yakho. Chofoza ukuze uphinde uthumele umlayezo
login.mobileExists: Uke wazama ukubhalisa ngale nombolo yeselula ngaphambilini? Uma kunjalo, hlola i-SMS yakho ukuze uvule i-akhawunti yakho. Chofoza ukuze uphinde uthumele umlayezo
login.facebookNoEmail: I-akhawunti yakho ye-facebook ishoda ngekheli le-imeyili eliqinisekisiwe. Vele ungene ngendlela yomdabu.

alert.title: Iqondisa kabusha ku-Wallet
alert.content: Uma usuvale le ngxoxo, uzoyiswa esikhwameni sakho. Ngemva kokungena ngemvume, buyela kuleli khasi.

placeholders.identifier: faka i-# yakho yeselula noma i-imeyili
